doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Shanthany Sirisena and Manju Vasvani Vs Condominium Management Authority and 2 others before Hon.. Mahen Gopallawa, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Shanthany Sirisena and Manju Vasvani Vs Condominium Management Authority and 2 others
latest_doc_d.keywords: condominium property – condominium unit-condominium plan- Condominium Management Authority – striking off company, vesting property in the State – deed of declaration – locus standi – contractual dispute - necessary parties – futility
